column2: SELECT TOP # a.albumId, SUM(t.unitprice) as totalPrice, COUNT(*) as numTracks FROM chinook.album a LEFT JOIN chinook.track t ON t.albumId = a.albumId  GROUP BY a.albumId ORDER BY totalPrice DESC) SELECT a.title, a.albumId, q1.totalPrice, art.Name FROM chinook.album a JOIN q1 on q1.albumId = a.albumId JOIN chinook.artist art on art.artistId = a.artistId
